mapper.select: SELECT PR.pr_id, PR.pr_gm, PR.pr_wm, PR.pr_td, PR.pr_ta FROM PR ORDER BY PR.pr_gm desc
SELECT PRDETAIL.employee_cd, PRDETAIL.prdetail_bs, PRDETAIL.prdetail_ta, PRDETAIL.prdetail_td, PRDETAIL.prdetail_rs, PRDETAIL.prdetail_id, PRDETAIL.pr_id FROM PRDETAIL WHERE PRDETAIL.pr_id = #{pr_id}

SELECT PRDETAIL.prdetail_rs, PRDETAIL.prdetail_ta, PRDETAIL.prdetail_bs, PRDETAIL.prdetail_mt, PRDETAIL.prdetail_ot, PRDETAIL.prdetail_na, PRDETAIL.prdetail_wa, PRDETAIL.prdetail_ha, PRDETAIL.prdetail_aa, PRDETAIL.prdetail_bn, PRDETAIL.prdetail_td, PRDETAIL.prdetail_gm, PRDETAIL.prdetail_gy, PRDETAIL.prdetail_gg , PRDETAIL.prdetail_lg, PRDETAIL.employee_cd FROM PRDETAIL WHERE PRDETAIL.prdetail_id = #{prdetail_id}
